body: This is becoming one of my favorite NTR hentai. Art is awesome and how the story is being told too.
This unused sketch n unused page in the ori story at the is kinda nice...like a behind the scene of a movie making. A glimpse of what was and what had become.

Still can't find a reason to side with Naoki, I'm still with Akiko in this one. Even if Naoki is dense or something, 4 years of nothing is bound to bring up any suspicions or some type of worriedness. Maybe he gave up on his wife and decided porn is the way? I don't fucking know. Also, NTR!
bruh the art is good fap material but the story is fucking depressing
Third one coming soon…hoho

Just look at page 61. There are already two stereotypes: the sweet boy and the fuckboy. Comming soon: the sugar daddy. LOL. But I don't blame the author. He has to sell his work.
(...)  If the author had finished with the infidelities here, it would be consistent, but there is a third man more for commercial reasons (marketing) than for plot coherence.

I, on the contrary, believe that this story is becoming less realistic. And I say this because in the third part, she will meet with an old man. In other words, she doesn't have a specific type of man ¿she doesn't care who she fucks? (and, oddly, she was more reserved than her husband, who masturbated to porn). Already after the second partner forced her to fuck, she should have learned to choose better and understand that this is not the way to find a lover. I think it's stupid that she thinks she deserves what happened to her. It is an excuse from the author for her to continue with the game after what happened to her. Anyone in their right mind would learn. But she continues without caring, because if she is punished does she will deserve it? LOL. On the other hand, the main reason I don't see so much realism anymore is that, as a marketing strategy, the author plays on stereotypes of men to make the reader identify with some of the guys. This takes away the realism in my opinion...

Why are some of you only blaming the husband, since the husband neglected her she should've just gotten a divorce, its like she is getting the best of two worlds, husband financially supporting her and other men sexually supporting her, i hope they get a divorce at the end

Surprisingly realistic NTR with a surprisingly good story. This is one of the best hentai I've read in a while. I'm half expecting a twist in the third chapter, but it's totally fine if there's no twist. One thing is for sure, though; the conclusion will be just as realistic as the rest of the story. They'll either divorce or perform some intensive reconciliation. I'm fine with either, but I'm betting on the former. It just doesn't seem like they're a good match for each other, unless the husband gives a VERY good reason for neglecting his wife for four years. Either way, I should probably read more works by this artist.
Been a fan since stay with me and i've expect no less from otaku beam, looking forward for any english adaptation

I, on the contrary, believe that this story is becoming less realistic. And I say this because in the third part, she will mess with an old man. In other words, she doesn't have a specific type of man. She hardly cares who she fucks with (and curiously she was more reserved than her husband who masturbated to pornography). Already after the second partner forced her to fuck, she should have learned to choose better. Here clearly the author plays with the stereotypes of men so that the reader identifies with some of the types, but this takes away realism in my opinion.
